This is where we make the moves that drive +24%/year. Quietly. Consistently.

🚨 Trade Alert: Allocation Changes after the close

A Tactical Rotation Just Triggered. Here's What Changed.

| 
| 
| Tactical Allocation Desk |

 |
| 
|  Oct 15 |  | 
| ∙ |  | Paid |

| READ IN APP |

 |

 |
|   |


We trade only three assets - UPRO, Bitcoin, and Gold - always 100% in or 100% out. No half measures.

Annual Returns (since 2020):
   
   -    
2020: +128,25%

   -    
2021: +76,1%

   -    
2022: +13,25%

   -    
2023: +97,25%

   -    
2024: +66.05%

   -    
2025 YTD: +25.7%


Unlock 24% CAGR

Here’s a snapshot of the last 5 UPRO trades executed by the model.

|  |  |  |


✅ Paid Section: Trade Executed

🔄 Position Change:

Bitcoin  0% → 25% 

Bitcoin:

|  |  |  |


Today we are buying back our Bitcoin position. We are allocating 25% of oure cahs into Bitcoin.

🧠 Reasoning

Our Exhaustion → Snapback setup just fired. Bitcoin has printed five consecutive bearish Heikin-Ashi candles, signalling persistent supply, while the fast Stochastic (11,3) shows %K < %D, indicating short-term momentum saturation. With the trading window permissive (vol-of-vol cooled), the probability of a sharp reflex higher outweighs downside from here. We’re entering at today’s close with 25% from our cash balance.

📌 Net Allocation After the Trade:
   
   -    
UPRO – 0 % 

   -    
Gold – 0% 

   -    
Bitcoin – 25% 

   -    
Money Market Fund – 75% 


As the Cash allocation, I recommend the following fund:
   
   -    
For EUR-based portfolios:   
Xtrackers II EUR Overnight Rate Swap UCITS ETF 1C (ISIN: LU0290358497)

   -    
For USD-based portfolios:   
Xtrackers II USD Overnight Rate Swap UCITS ETF 1C (ISIN: LU0321465469)


Stay tactical. Stay disciplined.

— The Tactical Allocation Letter

Message Tactical Allocation Desk

📄 Disclaimer

The information provided in this newsletter is for educational and informational purposes only and does not constitute investment advice, financial advice, trading advice, or any other sort of advice. The Tactical Allocation Letter does not recommend that any financial instrument be bought, sold, or held by you. Do your own due diligence and consult your financial advisor before making any investment decisions. Past performance is not indicative of future results. Investing involves risk, including the potential loss of principal.

This is where conviction lives. Signals built to outperform – and the clarity to follow them. Stay tuned. The next move might already be setting up.

subject: substack
body: [🧩] This Week’s Allocation: UPRO 0 % [❌]  Inactive Bitcoin 0% [❌]  Inactive Gold 0% [❌]  Inactive Money Market 100% [✅]  Active [🧠]  Allocation Rationale UPRO [🔴]  (Inactive, 0%) Profit target >+16% hit; we exited at the close per rules. The equity impulse matured and the give-back risk rose - full exit. Bitcoin [🔴]  (Inactive, 0%) Exit stack flipped yesterday. Heikin-Ashi bearish = 2 and the slow stochastic (%K < %D) rolled over. We close the position at EOD, finishing the trade at roughly +6.8% over 11 sessions.. Gold [🔴]  (Inactive, 0%) Profit target >+8% hit; we crystallized gains at the close. The window that fueled the snapback is no longer improving. Money Market [🟢]  (Active, 100%) No idle capital. We’ll rotate back to cash only on a confirmed trend reversal, a volatility breach, or a macro gate turning restrictive. As the Cash allocation, I recommend the following fund: For EUR-based portfolio
